author: Dave Sebastian
title: BEZOS: AMAZON to Test All Employees for Covid-19...
description: BEZOS: AMAZON to Test All Employees for Covid-19... (Second column, 9th story, link ) Related stories: DILLER: BAIL OUT EVERYONE! $6 trillion thrown at crisis... Loophole means big windfall for millionaires... Small business rescue loan program hits limit; Ou…
content:
Amazon.com Inc. has started building a testing capacity to diagnose all employees for Covid-19, including those who display no symptoms, Chief Executive Jeffrey Bezos said in a shareholder letter.
He echoed sentiments expressed at Wednesdays White House meet… [+272 chars]
